publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3908 Robert Brown: Scottish Commissioner for Human Rights Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Scottish Commissioner for Human Rights Bill. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*, Hugh Henry*
